content.rendered:
Directed by Prabhu Deva

Written by A.C. Mughil. Vijay Maurya

Cast Salman Khan (Radhe). Disha Patani (Diya). Randeep Hooda (Rana). Jackie Shroff (Avinash). Pravin Tarde (Dagdu). Gautam Gulati (Girgit). Sangay Tsheltrim (Lota). Govind Namdeo (I G Patil (as Govvind Namdev)). Sudhanshu Pandey (Dilawar). Arjun Kanungo (Mansoor). Ihana Dhillon (Mansoor’s Wife). Jacqueline Fernandez (Item Number (Song: Dil De Diya)). Vijay Singh (Ali (Dilawar’s Men)). Aryan Arora (Sumeet). Sumit Chandra (News Reporter ‘Man’). Shruti Bhist (Sumeet’s Sister). Mitansh Lulla (Azaan). Darshan Jariwala (D.I.G). Micky Makhija (Mumbai Commissioner). Pravessh Rana (Heeralal). Shubhankar Tripathi (Mannu). Shweta Yadav (Girl Raped by Heeralal). Ajay Paul (Human Commission Officer). Nikhil Dave (Human Commission Officer). Kalpana Rao (Human Commission Officer). Shraddha Singh (Human Commission Officer). Jayant Rawal (Human Commission Officer). Kamaal Malik (Landlord). Nancy Jain (Sairah). Ajay Nathwani (Doctor in Televsion). Disha Kapoor (Wife in Television). Bharath Srinivasan (Sarvesh). Megha Akash (Nikisha). Salim Baig (Nizamuddin). Ajay Singh (Crime Branche Officer). Nitin Tambe (Crime Branche Officer). Kabir Shereyar (Crime Branche Officer). Naveen Sharma (Crime Branche Officer). Krishnan Jatt (Crime Branche Officer). Rajesh Naag (Auto Rickshaw Driver). Ram Charan Sirka (Dilawar Man (as Ramcharan Sirka)). Javed Rizvi (Dagdu Man (as Javed Hyder)). Yuvraj Singh (Dagdu Man 2). Narra Srinivas (Pakiya). Anand Vijay Kumar (Photographer (as Andy Kumar)). Shaharyar Khan (Azaan Grand Father). Vishwajeet Pradhan (ACP Arjun). Shawar Ali (Vipul (as Shahwar Ali Khan)). Siddarth Jadhav (Ranjeet Mawani). Lavi Pajni (Ranjeet Marwani’s Big Man). Jyoti Rana (Hotel Manager Seema). Avanti Pappu (Girls-1 in Hotel with Avinash). Sofia Basiwal (Girls-2 in Hotel with Avinash). Monica Chaudhary (Girls-3 in Hotel with Avinash). Kriti Dhir (Girls-1 in Rest Room). Anchal Verma (Girls-2 in Rest Room). Manveer Gurjar (Club Manager). Rajkumar Kanojia (Police Informer-1). Sachin Kathuria (Police Informer-2). Sanjay Bhatia (Doctor ‘Dilawar Post Mortem’). Saniya Haq (Drug Rehabilitation Girl). Naveen Bawa (Fake Officer-1). Mubin Saudagar (Fake Officer-2). Ajay Kumar (Officer). Veerendra Saxena (Radhe’s Father (edited portion) (uncredited)). Zarina Wahab (Radhe’s Mother (edited portion) (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Atul Agnihotri. Harish Amin. Akash Borkar. Dilip Borkar. Sushila Charak. Sohail Khan. Shamiraah Nambiar. Nikhil Namit. Jigar Shah

Production Sohail Khan Production. Reel Life Production. Salman Khan Film
